channel.title: Department of Defense on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Department of Defense on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: On a day of rebranding at the Pentagon, this name change slipped under the radar
item.description: We’ll see how long the Department of War lasts. Space Force Combat Forces Command might stick around.

item.title: Defense Department Scrambles to Pretend It’s Called the War Department
item.description: President Donald Trump said the so-called Department of War branding is to counter the “woke” Department of Defense name.

item.title: Defense Department Scrambles to Pretend It’s Called the War Department
item.description: President Donald Trump said the so-called Department of War branding is to counter the “woke” Department of Defense name.

item.title: Microsoft to stop using China-based teams to support Department of Defense
item.description: The tech giant has relied on global workforce to support federal clients.
